network.param.modules.workflow

Interface IWorkflowStep

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IBean
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WorkflowStep

    public interface IWorkflowStep
extends IBean
    An interface represents the workflow step information.

    This interface IWorkflowStep will represents set name, description, is multiple and tag.., IWorkflowStep defines below categories of operations:

    • setName method to set name.

    • getName method to get the name.

    • setDescription method set description.

    • getDescription method get description.

    • addWorkflowField method add workflow field.

    • setMultiStep method set workflow field is MultiStep.

    • isMultiStep method get workflow field is multiStep or not.

    • getTag method get tag for the workflow fields.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jitendra Kumar Balla, ParamNetwork
